extendedInfo.description: *****NEW VERSION HAS BEEN UPDATED!!!!*****This game is about throwing rubbish into bins.  But be aware of the kind of rubbish.  If you throw it into wrong bins, you will be deducted one mark.  After playing this game, you will know what kinds of rubbish can be recycled.  Also you can also realize the differences between each countries.Have fun!We are students of City University of Hong Kong (Electronic Engineering Department).   If you have any comments on this game, please leave them to us.  Your information could let us to have better design.
